alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY THROUGH 400 PM PDT... At 253 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm around 10 miles southeast of Califonia Valley along the San Luis Obispo/Kern County border. The storm was drifting slowly to the northwwest at around 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, nickel size hail, heavy downpours with localized flooding, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrizo Plain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys
